alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Elbert County through 300 PM MDT... At 213 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Kiowa, or 34 miles west of Limon, moving east at 10 mph. Other strong thunderstorms were developing near the town of Elbert. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elbert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
